title: Finding Love In New York
description: Gabby Fitzpatrick has moved to New York from Ireland with her best friend Jen Malone, she’s exited yet nervous moving so far from home and her family but with a great gob as PA to the vice president of CJ games she’s looking foreword to starting a new chapter in her life. While out with Jen for drinks after work she meets gorgeous Callum Jacobs, he’s arrogant bossy outspoken and unlike any man the shy and quiet Gabby has ever encountered, but the chemistry between the two is instant and intense. Gabby discovers Callum owns the company she’s just started working for and although she’s hesitant to get involved with the owner of the company the attraction is too strong to ignore. What follows is a journey of passion, love and obsession.
author: Mags Timmons
